description:
Sexy hung Mistress Soleli comes home from clubbing
when she notices her neighbor Stefano's door is
unlocked. Stefano has been flirting with her for a
month now, not knowing the HUGE secret that Soleli has
under her skirt. So she slips into his room,
handcuffs him, and turns him into a cock-loving slut
for the night. Do you think he will tell his friends
he is now in love with a shemale with a huge cock?
One thing is sure, he will keep his door unlocked more
often.
title: Stefano and Mistress Soleli
